details:
This package provides a ham radio logging program for KDE.
 This application supports logging for HF and VHF operations.
 It supports many features like QSL, DXCC, IOTA, WAZ and awards.
 KLog imports from TLF and produces ADIF as default file format.
 This application also includes a DX-Cluster client fully integrated
 into the main interface.
 scope::utility, suite::kde, uitoolkit::qt, works-with::logfile,
 x11::application
